## Props

| Prop | Type | Description | Default |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
| isFullWidth | `boolean` | Whether the tabs should take up the full width of the container. | `false` |
| items* | `TabItem[]` | All the tabs to be rendered. |  |
| tab* | `TabItem` |  |  |
